languages.text: Все попытки освободить Леди-Навигатора были тщетны — ее хрупкое тело тонуло в бурлящей на холсте крови. И когда протянутая рука Кассии полностью оказалась по другую сторону картины, десятки лап тут же вырвались из глубин холста, обвили тело Лорд-капитана и затащили вторую жертву в глубины сотворенного Леди-Навигатором мира.

traits.locale_text: Все попытки освободить Леди-Навигатора оказываются тщетны — ее хрупкое тело тонет в ожившей, бурлящей на холсте крови. И когда протянутая рука Кассии полностью оказывается по другую сторону картины... Ее крики стихают, словно погруженные под воду. И десятки нарисованных рук тут же вырываются из глубин холста, обвивают тело Лорд-капитана, раздирают кожу, сдавливают легкие... И затаскивают очередную жертву в глубины сотворенного Леди-Навигатором мира.

languages.text: The Lord Captain's efforts to free the Lady Navigator were to no avail: her body was drowning in the roiling blood on the canvas. And as soon as Cassia's outstretched hand had fully vanished inside the painting, dozens of hands emerged from the canvas, wrapped themselves around the Lord Captain's body, and dragged their second victim into the world of the Lady Navigator's creation.
languages.original_text: Все попытки освободить Леди-Навигатора были тщетны — ее хрупкое тело тонуло в бурлящей на холсте крови. И когда протянутая рука Кассии полностью оказалась по другую сторону картины, десятки лап тут же вырвались из глубин холста, обвили тело Лорд-капитана и затащили вторую жертву в глубины сотворенного Леди-Навигатором мира.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain's efforts to free the Lady Navigator were for naught — her body was drowning in the roiling blood on the canvas. And as soon as Cassia's outstretched hand had fully vanished inside the painting, dozens of hands emerged from the canvas, wrapped themselves around the Lord Captain's body, and dragged their second victim into the world of the Lady Navigator's creation.

And as soon as Cassia's outstretched hand had fully vanished inside the painting, dozens of hands emerged from the canvas, wrapped themselves around the Lord Captain's body, and dragged their second victim into the world of the Lady Navigator's creation.

The Lord Captain's efforts to free the Lady Navigator were to no avail: her body was drowning in the roiling blood on the canvas. And as soon as Cassia's outstretched hand had fully vanished inside the painting, dozens of hands emerged from the canvas, wrapped themselves around the Lord Captain's body, and dragged their second victim into the world of the Lady Navigator's creation.

languages.text: 航宙士を解放しようとするロード・キャプテンの試みは無駄に終わった。彼女の身体は画布の血だまりに溺れていた。カシアが突き出した手が完全に絵の中へ消えてしまうとすぐに、何十という手が画布から現れてロード・キャプテンの身体をぐるりと包み、第二の犠牲者として航宙士殿が創造した世界へと引きずり込んだ。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's efforts to free the Lady Navigator were to no avail: her body was drowning in the roiling blood on the canvas. And as soon as Cassia's outstretched hand had fully vanished inside the painting, dozens of hands emerged from the canvas, wrapped themselves around the Lord Captain's body, and dragged their second victim into the world of the Lady Navigator's creation.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士を解放しようとするロード・キャプテンの試みは無駄に終わった。彼女の身体は画布の血だまりに溺れていた。カシアが突き出した手が完全に絵の中へ消えてしまうとすぐに、何十という手が画布から現れてロード・キャプテンの身体をぐるりと包み、第二の犠牲者として航宙士殿が創造した世界へと引きずり込んだ。

languages.text: 舰长大人想要努力解救卡西娅，但无济于事。卡西娅的身体被画布上翻滚的鲜血吞没了。她的手才刚刚彻底消失在画中，几十只新的手臂就从画布中伸了出来，缠住了舰长大人的身体，将第二位受害者也拖入了卡西娅创造出的世界里。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's efforts to free the Lady Navigator were to no avail: her body was drowning in the roiling blood on the canvas. And as soon as Cassia's outstretched hand had fully vanished inside the painting, dozens of hands emerged from the canvas, wrapped themselves around the Lord Captain's body, and dragged their second victim into the world of the Lady Navigator's creation.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人想要努力解救卡西娅，但无济于事。卡西娅的身体被画布上翻滚的鲜血吞没了。她的手才刚刚彻底消失在画中，几十只新的手臂就从画布中伸了出来，缠住了舰长大人的身体，将第二位受害者也拖入了卡西娅创造出的世界里。

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a tenté de libérer la dame navigatrice, mais en vain : le corps de Cassia s'est inexorablement fondu dans le sang de la toile. Une fois sa main tendue disparue dans le tableau, des dizaines d'appendices ont brusquement surgi de la toile pour s'enrouler autour {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} et attirer leur seconde victime dans le monde créé par la dame navigatrice.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's efforts to free the Lady Navigator were to no avail: her body was drowning in the roiling blood on the canvas. And as soon as Cassia's outstretched hand had fully vanished inside the painting, dozens of hands emerged from the canvas, wrapped themselves around the Lord Captain's body, and dragged their second victim into the world of the Lady Navigator's creation.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a tenté de libérer la dame navigatrice, mais en vain : le corps de Cassia s'est inexorablement fondu dans le sang de la toile. Une fois sa main tendue disparue dans le tableau, des dizaines d'appendices ont brusquement surgi de la toile pour s'enrouler autour {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} et attirer leur seconde victime dans le monde créé par la dame navigatrice.

languages.text: Los esfuerzos {mf|de|de la} Lord Capitán por liberar a la lady Navegante fueron en vano: su cuerpo se ahogaba en la burbujeante sangre del lienzo. Y en cuanto la mano extendida de Cassia hubo desaparecido por completo en el interior del cuadro, docenas de manos emergieron del lienzo, se cerraron en torno al cuerpo {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán y arrastraron a su segunda víctima a aquel mundo creado por la lady Navegante.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's efforts to free the Lady Navigator were to no avail: her body was drowning in the roiling blood on the canvas. And as soon as Cassia's outstretched hand had fully vanished inside the painting, dozens of hands emerged from the canvas, wrapped themselves around the Lord Captain's body, and dragged their second victim into the world of the Lady Navigator's creation.

traits.locale_text: Los esfuerzos {mf|de|de la} Lord Capitán por liberar a la lady Navegante fueron en vano: su cuerpo se ahogaba en la burbujeante sangre del lienzo. Y en cuanto la mano extendida de Cassia hubo desaparecido por completo en el interior del cuadro, docenas de manos emergieron del lienzo, se cerraron en torno al cuerpo {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán y arrastraron a su segunda víctima a aquel mundo creado por la lady Navegante.

languages.text: Die Bemühungen des Lord Captains, die Lady Navigator zu befreien, waren vergeblich: Ihr Körper ertrank in dem wirbelnden Blut auf der Leinwand. Und sobald Cassias ausgestreckte Hand vollständig in dem Gemälde verschwunden war, tauchten Dutzende von Händen aus der Leinwand auf, wickelten sich um den Körper des Lord Captains und zogen ihr zweites Opfer in die von der Lady Navigator erschaffene Welt.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's efforts to free the Lady Navigator were to no avail: her body was drowning in the roiling blood on the canvas. And as soon as Cassia's outstretched hand had fully vanished inside the painting, dozens of hands emerged from the canvas, wrapped themselves around the Lord Captain's body, and dragged their second victim into the world of the Lady Navigator's creation.

traits.locale_text: Die Bemühungen des Lord Captains, die Lady Navigator zu befreien, waren vergeblich: Ihr Körper ertrank in dem wirbelnden Blut auf der Leinwand. Und sobald Cassias ausgestreckte Hand vollständig in dem Gemälde verschwunden war, tauchten Dutzende von Händen aus der Leinwand auf, wickelten sich um den Körper des Lord Captains und zogen ihr zweites Opfer in die von der Lady Navigator erschaffene Welt.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın Leydi Rotacı'yı kurtarma çabaları nafile kaldı: Leydi Rotacı'nın vücudu, tuvaldeki çalkantılı kanın içinde boğuluyordu. Cassia'nın uzattığı el tablonun içinde tamamen kaybolur kaybolmaz, tuvalden onlarca el çıkıp Lord Kaptan'ın vücudunu sardıkları gibi Leydi Rotacı'nın yarattığı dünyanın derinliklerine bir başka kurban daha sürükledi.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's efforts to free the Lady Navigator were to no avail: her body was drowning in the roiling blood on the canvas. And as soon as Cassia's outstretched hand had fully vanished inside the painting, dozens of hands emerged from the canvas, wrapped themselves around the Lord Captain's body, and dragged their second victim into the world of the Lady Navigator's creation.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'ın Leydi Rotacı'yı kurtarma çabaları nafile kaldı: Leydi Rotacı'nın vücudu, tuvaldeki çalkantılı kanın içinde boğuluyordu. Cassia'nın uzattığı el tablonun içinde tamamen kaybolur kaybolmaz, tuvalden onlarca el çıkıp Lord Kaptan'ın vücudunu sardıkları gibi Leydi Rotacı'nın yarattığı dünyanın derinliklerine bir başka kurban daha sürükledi.
